channel.title: Illustrator on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrator on ERIC WANG

item.title: @Ministry of Interior - Computer graphics
item.description: At the ministry of Interior and more specically at the Border Police, I produce quantity of infographics to highlight weekly report for the ministry cabinet.

item.title: @Carbone 4 - Consultant
item.description: After graduation, I have joined a consulting firm Carbone 4, specialised in climate change strategy. One of the three mission for a water actor is carbon price and its strategic involvement for future law appliance.

item.title: @SNCFxIAU - Junior research analyst
item.description: Internship made at SNCF in collaboration with l'Institut de la Région Île-de-France regarding the impact of 2 new lines, today and in 2030.
